title: IS_VEHICLE_SIREN_ON
content:
0x4C9BF537BE2634B20x25EB5873// IsVehicleSirenOn
BOOL IS_VEHICLE_SIREN_ON(Vehicle vehicle);Returns: Returns false if siren and lights are disabled or true if they are enabled.Returns whether the vehicle's lights and sirens are on.Examples:Lualocal veh = GetVehiclePedIsIn(PlayerPedId())
print(tostring(IsVehicleSirenOn(veh))
